name: snake (itch) (Lio Lim)
description:
Originally designed as a part of SUTD Movie Hackathon 2018
https://www.sutd.edu.sg/About-Us/News-and-Events/Events/2018/11/SUTD-Movie-Hackathon

Snake with a twist.
As the game goes on, poisons are introduced to make it harder.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Mouse to select.
